sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A vindication of the orthodoxe Protestant doctrine against the innovations of Dr. Drayton and Mr. Parker, domestique chaplain to the Right Honourable the E. of Pembroke, in the following positions. Tendring, John.
[14], 77, [1] p.
printed for Richard Royston, at the Angel in Ivie-lane, London : 1657.
Foreword signed: John Tendring. Concerns a debate on the subject of original sin and grace. Annotation on Thomason copy: "8ber [i.e. October] 21". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

printed for Richard Royston, at the Angel in Ivie-lane, London : 1657.
Foreword signed: John Tendring. Concerns a debate on the subject of original sin and grace. Annotation on Thomason copy: "8ber [i.e. October] 21". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
